title: All Ball - Zion Debut Wasn't Great; Kansas/K-State Brawl; Guests - Insider Evan Daniels on the Bronny James Phenomenon
itunes:title: All Ball - Zion Debut Wasn't Great; Kansas/K-State Brawl; Guests - Insider Evan Daniels on the Bronny James Phenomenon
description:
This week, Gottlieb explains why he wasn't as impressed with Zion Williamson's debut as the majority of fans and media and gives his take on the fallout from the brawl at the end of the Kansas/K-State game. Guest FS1 college hoops insider Evan Daniels gives his observations after witnessing the Bronny James phenomenon in-person, and if surprising Seton Hall can win the Big East. University of Wisconsin student, L,A, native, analytics whiz kid Charley Wadler discusses Bronny James decision to attend Crossroads, and breaks down the Big Ten field. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
